item.title: Social Security's estimated 2026 cost-of-living adjustment rises amid inflation uptick
item.description: The projection for Social Security's 2026 cost-of-living adjustment rose to 2.7% as inflation trends higher, as the program faces insolvency challenge...

item.title: Starbucks CEO sets new time goal for baristas making your order
item.description: Starbucks CEO sets a new service goal for baristas in order to improve in-store experience for customers, changes happen at stores across the U.S.
